New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2025 年 1 月 20 日星期一 06:17:46 +0000 zh 1每小时1
Waikato man Hikurangi Harrison found with .22 shotgun in car, 30cm knife shoved in air vent https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/waikato-man-hikurangi-harrison-found-with-22-shotgun-in-car-30cm-knife-shoved-in-air-vent/BDBR5POXKVEQDGHYQ2P56AF4UI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/waikato-man-hikurangi-harrison-found-with-22-shotgun-in-car-30cm-knife-shoved-in-air-vent/BDBR5POXKVEQDGHYQ2P56AF4UI/ Belinda FeekHikurangi Harrison was also sentenced on a reckless driving charge. Mon, 20 Jan 2025 05:58:37 +0000 Police found Waikato man Hikurangi Harrison sitting in his car with this 30cm knife shoved into the air vent. He was sentenced to six months' home detention for that and other offending on Friday. Photo / Supplied
Russian businessman buys former Ashburton council buildinghttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ Russian-businessman-buys-former-ashburton-council-building/DJWLG6VW7NDODHUFAZU5RYRAZM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ Russian-businessman-buys-former-ashburton-council-building/DJWLG6VW7NDODHUFAZU5RYRAZM/ Jonathan LeaskThe Russian business also owns a high country station in Mid Canterbury. Mon, 20 Jan 2025 05:47:04 +0000 A Russian business that owns a high country station in Mid Canterbury now owns a slice of Ashburton's CBD.

Mon, 20 Jan 2025 05:46:06 +0000 The jetskier went missing following an accident on Lake Taupō yesterday afternoon. Photo / Supplied

United States woman in court over alleged 31kg meth smuggling attempt at Auckland International Airport https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/united-states-woman-in-court-over-alleged-31kg-meth-smuggling-attempt-at-auckland-international-airport/OOX4K2EYZJHZRJ75NEO7AMBJZ4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/united-states-woman-in-court-over-alleged-31kg-meth-smuggling-attempt-at-auckland-international-airport/OOX4K2EYZJHZRJ75NEO7AMBJZ4/ Benjamin PlummerThe 24-year-old woman appeared in court today and has been remanded in custody.
